messages.text: Hi! I need help with my account settings.

messages.title: Support Agent
messages.subtitle: Analyzing your request...
messages.text: I'd be happy to help you with your account settings. What specifically would you like to change?
I want to update my email address and notification preferences.

messages.title: Support Agent
messages.text:
Perfect! Here's what you need to do:

1. Go to Settings > Account
2. Click 'Edit Email'
3. Update your preferences in the Notifications tab

Let me know if you need any help with these steps!

messages.title: Support Agent
messages.text: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?

metadata.description: Sample conversation showing all available message fields
